data.actual_result: A Discord browser tab is opening saying that the adding of the PayPal details succeeded.
data.expected_result: A Discord browser tab should be opening to say that we canceled the adding of the PayPal details.
data.short_description: Cancelling the addition of a PayPal account does not work correctly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to desktop settings > Billing - Click on "Add Payment Method" > "Paypal" - In the browser tab that is opening, click on "Cancel and return to Discord Inc." -
